title: SQL Injection
description:
Exploit a SQL injection vulnerability to extract sensitive data from the database.

Objective:
- Identify injection points in web forms or URLs
- Bypass authentication or extract data
- Consider blind SQLi if no direct output

Common payloads:
- ' OR '1'='1
- UNION SELECT NULL, NULL, ...
- Time-based: ' AND SLEEP(5)--

Tools: sqlmap, Burp Suite, manual testing
